text: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

translation.en: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained [with the evildoers]
translation.id: Kemudian Kami selamatkan dia dan pengikutnya, kecuali istrinya. Dia (istrinya) termasuk orang-orang yang tertinggal
